attributes.review: I thought to myself, maybe it’s not as bad as the reviews say, WRONG. it is definitely cursed. i was walking in the park and suddenly a squirrel knocked on my head then a bunch of squirrels worked together to carry me to a hole that led to garbage! NOT COOL TRUMP!
attributes.title: WORSE THAN ROOM TEMP WATER ON A HOT SUMMER DAY

attributes.review: It was completely unorganized and so bad (like our president) and it proceeded to give in factual information about what is going on in America. It also referred to COVID-19 as the “China virus” which is extremely racist
attributes.title: Horrible 🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app is disgusting just like the Cheeto puff as president, ultimately it sends me notifications of his spray tan when it was leaked, absolutely  small, also He's invited to the cook out 🧚‍♀️💗 needed a replacement for the lost pig 🐖🌟🌠
attributes.title: Your mom made a mistake 🍤🍤

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was a horrible experience. As our president he should do better. I am very disappointed as well as dissatisfied.
attributes.title: The worst experience ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could support my president, but I come to find out he’s dead!! Why has no one taken this app down yet?! You all are being so insensitive to our late president.
attributes.title: TAKE IT DOWN- INSENSITIVE

attributes.review: I tried asking for help but Donald J. Trump just simply told me that’s what happens when your illegal and you come to America I was born here in America how does that make me illegal and none of my family members are illegal
Absolute abomination to American culture, society, and history.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app, wanting to support my president, and I was instantly bombarded with “Would you like to support the app?” And I didn’t even get to sign in yet, this is just stupid.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I am absolutely disgusted with Trump. I’m officers get away with taking and it’s a black lives and letting ice take away innocent young Mexican children and selling them off the sex trafficking camps. Defund the police demolish ice and put Donald Trump behind Bars.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: As Mr. President once said the J in his name stands Jenius. I think our president has maybe one or two brain cells and I’m being generous. How did the lack of Jenius brain cells end him up in office, while looking like a Cheeto puff idk. 2020 president🧚🧚‍♂️💗👑 but make it Obama✨💗🧚‍♂️👑
attributes.title: Donald Jenius Trump
